Package de.dlr.proseo.ingestor.rest

Class ProductControllerDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dlr.proseo.ingestor.rest.ProductControllerDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProductController
    @RestController
@RequestMapping(value="/proseo/ingestor/{version}/products",
                produces="application/json")
@Validated
public class ProductControllerDecorator
extends Object
implements ProductController
    Methods to manage product metadata in the database (Generated with springmvc-raml-parser v.2.0.5)

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<RestProduct>> getProducts​(String mission, String[] productClass, String mode, String fileClass, String quality, String startTimeFrom, String startTimeTo, String genTimeFrom, String genTimeTo, Long recordFrom, Long recordTo, Long jobStep, String[] orderBy, org.springframework.http.HttpHeaders httpHeaders)
      List of all products by mission, product class, processing mode, file class, quality and time ranges of start time and generation time; the output will be ordered by the columns given in orderBy, and the resulting product list will only contain the records in the given range
